_sText:
Im a fan of Crash Bandicoot games.. I love the Crash Bash's Polar Panic game and so i make it for CSS MG. You have to push your ennemies out of ice platform, in the water. To make your Polar push the others, you have to jump in them direction. 
Note: first there is rocks on edges. Simply push ennemies on them to break them.

Have fun !
